traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The sprite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The sprite is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10, +2 to hit with spell attacks). The sprite has the following spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, druidcraft
1st level (3 slots): entangle, faerie fire

actions.name: Heart Sight
actions.desc: The sprite touches a creature and magically knows the creature's current emotional state. If the target fails a DC 10 Charisma saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature's alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

actions.name: Quick Stab
actions.desc: The sprite makes one Shortsword attack.

actions.name: Fly (Costs 2 Actions)
actions.desc: The sprite moves up to its fly speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

bonus_actions.name: Fey Step
bonus_actions.desc: The sprite teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Misty Escape (1/Day)
reactions.desc: When the sprite takes damage, it can turn invisible and teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. The invisibility lasts until the start of its next turn or until it attacks or casts a spell.

mythic_actions.desc: If the Mythic Sprite is a mythic encounter, it can take the following mythic action when it uses its Heart Sight legendary action.

actions.name: Mythic Invisibility (Costs 1 Mythic Action)
actions.desc: As a bonus action, the sprite magically turns invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the sprite wears or carries is invisible with it.
